I think there’s a big need for this one, so it gets my

(2) "Citizens at Work" — NBC-Municipal League
I like this even better than MThe People Act”, its ob¬
vious predecessor. Well written, produced, and acted,
and effective in getting the idea of citizen-action
across.
One of the sample tapes dealt with Greenwich, Conn.,
a town I happen to know well. The description of the
overall spirit and flavor of the town was right on the
button, and so was the statement of the town’s political
problem, so I’m sure these are thoroughly documented.
Liked also the touches of humor and human interest. I
think this is a top-drawer series.
